name: Jungle bird hunter 3d - free shooting game
name_original: Jungle bird hunter 3d - free shooting game
description:
Hunter! winter is near and you have to hunt for the survival as food is going to be vital for life . Everything is going to be filled with ice and you are going to be left with no choice but to use what you have stored before winter.

So hunt hunt and hunt. this jungle is full of birds and some birds can attack you . so hunt before wild birds attack you and leave you blind .
